name: Nile
hint: The longest river in Africa, flowing northward through eleven countries to the Mediterranean Sea

name: Congo
hint: Africa's second-longest river and the deepest in the world, flowing through the Congo Basin

name: Niger
hint: West Africa's principal river, forming a great arc through Mali and Niger before reaching Nigeria

name: Zambezi
hint: The fourth-longest river in Africa, famous for Victoria Falls on its course through southern Africa

name: Orange
hint: The longest river in South Africa, flowing westward to the Atlantic Ocean

name: Limpopo
hint: A major river in southern Africa forming the border between South Africa and Botswana/Zimbabwe

name: Senegal
hint: A West African river forming the border between Senegal and Mauritania

name: Blue Nile
hint: A major tributary of the Nile, originating from Lake Tana in Ethiopia

name: White Nile
hint: The primary stream of the Nile, stretching from Lake Victoria through South Sudan to Khartoum

name: Volta
hint: A major river in West Africa flowing through Ghana, dammed to create Lake Volta, one of the world's largest reservoirs
